name: Supreme Bliss, Chika
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Shuchiin》 character, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn. (Return the revealed card to its original place)

【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 level 1 or lower character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor_text: It's out of this world!

name: Serious Showdown Between Geniuses, Chika
ability: 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《Shuchiin》, this card gets +1000 power.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Yo! Man♪" is placed on your climax area, if you have another 《Shuchiin》 character, choose 1 of the following abilities, and this card gets that ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 cost 0 or lower character in your opponent's center stage, put it into their waiting room, and this card gets +1000 power until end of turn." "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand."
flavor_text: You're out, yo!

name: Critical Hit, Chika
ability: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Love Detective" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: Ishigami... That's creepy! Hahaha

name: Shameful, Chika
ability: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Shuchiin》 characters, this card gets +4000 power.

【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, all players return all cards from their waiting room to their decks, and all players shuffle their decks.
flavor_text: Yu: "Underhanded! Playing dirty! You haven't learned your lesson at all! You're shameless! How did you get to be so shameless? The most shameful thing is how he won by finding your method and using it himself!"

name: Fireworks Display, Yu
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Shuchiin》 characters.

【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavor_text: President, I got us a car!

name: Consumer, Chika
ability: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Shuchiin》 characters, this card gets +1000 power.
【CONT】 The character facing this card gets -1 soul.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "Ramen Connoisseur" is in your climax area, and you have another 《Shuchiin》 character, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to 1 of your opponent's characters, return it to their hand, and put up to 1 card from the top of your clock into your waiting room.

name: Escaping From Reality, Yu
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Shuchiin》 characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.
【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, move this card to an open position of your back stage.
flavor_text: I want to die, so I'm going home.

name: Tank-Class, Chika
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Shuchiin》 characters get +500 power.

【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose up to 1 of your opponent's characters, put it into their memory, and your opponent puts that character from their memory on any position of their stage.
flavor_text: - On the other hand, Chika Fujiwara's offensive ability is tank-class. -

name: God of Thunder, Chika
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you do not have another 《Shuchiin》 character, put this card into your waiting room.

【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 《Shuchiin》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Additional Blow, Yu
ability: 【AUTO】 [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters with level higher than your opponent's level, and put it into your opponent's waiting room.

【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1000, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn)
flavor_text: It really is!

name: Seasonal Uniform Change, Chika
ability: 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《Shuchiin》, this card gets +1000 power.
【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step.

name: Flustered, Chika
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, put them on the top of your deck in any order, choose up to 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to their hand.
【ACT】 [Put 1 "Love Detective" from your hand into your waiting room] Choose up to 2 of your characters, and those characters get +2000 power until end of turn.

name: Happiness Tax, Yu
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Shuchiin》 character or an event, put it into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)

【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may choose 1 card in your opponent's clock, and put it into their waiting room. If you do, your opponent puts the top card of their deck into their clock.

name: Meddling, Chika
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Shuchiin》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Shuchiin》 characters you have ×500.

name: Chika Having Faraway Thoughts
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, your opponent puts the bottom card of their stock into their waiting room.

name: Full Throttle! Yu
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your level 3 or higher characters in front of this card get +2000 power.
【AUTO】 When your opponent uses "Brainstorm", if a climax is put into their waiting room by that effect, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.

If you do, search your deck for up to 2 《Shuchiin》 characters, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Love Detective

Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Shuchiin》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. You may choose 1 cost 0 or lower character in your opponent's center stage, and return it to their hand.

name: Shut Up, You Moron!
ability: If you do not have a character with "Miyuki(御行)" or "Yu(優)" in its card name, this card cannot be played from your hand.
Choose 1 of the following effects, and perform it.
"All of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn."
"Choose up to 5 of your opponent's characters, put them into their memory, and your opponent puts those characters from their memory on separate positions of their stage."
"If your opponent has 5 or more cards in their memory, your opponent puts all cards from their memory into their waiting room."

name: Marked Deck
ability: Choose 1 of your 《Shuchiin》 characters, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.
Put this card into your stock.

All players reveal the top card of their deck. If the level of your revealed card is higher than your opponent's, choose 1 《Shuchiin》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. If the level of your opponent's revealed card is higher than yours, your opponent chooses 1 of their characters, and that character gets +5000 power until end of turn. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed cards to their original place)

ability: 【CONT】 The character facing this card cannot move to another position of the stage.

ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your level 0 or lower characters in front of this card get +1000 power.

【AUTO】 [Put this card into your waiting room] When your other character with "Kaguya(かぐや)" in its card name is put into your waiting room from the stage, if this card is in your back stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return that character to its previous stage position as 【REST】.
flavor_text: Actually, he suddenly asked me out.

name: Smartphone Debut, Miyuki
ability: 【CONT】 Experience During your turn, if the total level of the cards in your level is 1 or higher, this card gets +2500 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 2, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn."

ability: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if you have a 《Shuchiin》 character, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

ability: 【CONT】 Experience If the total level of the cards in your level is 5 or higher, this card gets +3000 power.

【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, move it to another open position of their stage, and this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.

ability: If you do not have a character with "Kaguya(かぐや)" or "Miyuki(御行)" in its card name, this card cannot be played from your hand.
Begin a Romantic Battle of the Brains.
【REPLAY】 Begin a Romantic Battle of the Brains Draw up to 1 card, choose up to 3 of your characters, and they get the following 2 abilities until end of your opponent's next turn.
"【CONT】 The character facing this card cannot side attack."
"【CONT】 This card's soul does not decrease by side attacking."

ability: If you do not have a 《Shuchiin》 character, this card cannot be played from your hand.
Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn.

"【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, choose 1 《Shuchiin》 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn."
Choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and that character gets -500 power until end of turn.

ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

ability: 【AUTO】When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the【STANDBY】effect.
(【STANDBY】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with a level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as【REST】)
